00022  *
00023  *
00024  * Adaptation bloc of the vertical guidance
00025  * This is a dimension one kalman filter estimating
00026  * the ratio of vertical acceleration over thrust command ( ~ invert of the mass )
00027  * needed by the invert dynamic model to produce a nominal command
00028  */
00029 
00030 #ifndef GUIDANCE_V_ADPT
00031 #define GUIDANCE_V_ADPT
00032 
00033 extern int32_t gv_adapt_X;
00034 extern int32_t gv_adapt_P;
00035 extern int32_t gv_adapt_Xmeas;
00036 
00037 
00038 #ifdef GUIDANCE_V_C
00039 
00040 /* Our State
00041    Q13.18
00042 */
00043 int32_t gv_adapt_X;
00044 #define GV_ADAPT_X_FRAC 18
00045 
00046 /* Our covariance
00047    Q13.18
00048 */
00049 int32_t gv_adapt_P;
00050 #define GV_ADAPT_P_FRAC 18
00051 
00052 /* Our measurement */
00053 int32_t gv_adapt_Xmeas;
00054 
00055 
00056 /* Initial State and Covariance    */
00057 #define GV_ADAPT_X0_F 0.15
00058 #define GV_ADAPT_X0 BFP_OF_REAL(GV_ADAPT_X0_F, GV_ADAPT_X_FRAC)
00059 #define GV_ADAPT_P0_F 0.5
00060 #define GV_ADAPT_P0 BFP_OF_REAL(GV_ADAPT_P0_F, GV_ADAPT_P_FRAC)
00061 
00062 /* System and Measuremement noises */
00063 #define GV_ADAPT_SYS_NOISE_F 0.00005
00064 #define GV_ADAPT_SYS_NOISE  BFP_OF_REAL(GV_ADAPT_SYS_NOISE_F, GV_ADAPT_P_FRAC)
00065 
00066 #ifndef USE_ADAPT_HOVER
00067 
00068 #define GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_F 2.0
00069 #define GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE BFP_OF_REAL(GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_F, GV_ADAPT_P_FRAC)
00070 
00071 #else /* USE_ADAPT_HOVER */
00072 
00073 #define GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_HOVER_F 10.0
00074 #define GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_HOVER BFP_OF_REAL(GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_HOVER_F, GV_ADAPT_P_FRAC)
00075 #define GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_F 50.0
00076 #define GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE BFP_OF_REAL(GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_F, GV_ADAPT_P_FRAC)
00077 
00078 #define GV_ADAPT_MAX_ACCEL ACCEL_BFP_OF_REAL(4.0)
00079 #define GV_ADAPT_HOVER_ACCEL ACCEL_BFP_OF_REAL(1.0)
00080 #define GV_ADAPT_MAX_CMD 180
00081 #define GV_ADAPT_MIN_CMD 20
00082 #define GV_ADAPT_HOVER_MAX_CMD 120
00083 #define GV_ADAPT_HOVER_MIN_CMD 60
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 static inline void gv_adapt_init(void) {
00087   gv_adapt_X = GV_ADAPT_X0;
00088   gv_adapt_P = GV_ADAPT_P0;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*
00092   zdd_meas : INT32_ACCEL_FRAC
00093   thrust_applied : controller input [2-200]
00094 */
00095 #define K_FRAC 12
00096 static inline void gv_adapt_run(int32_t zdd_meas, int32_t thrust_applied) {
00097 
00098   /* Do you really think we want to divide by zero ? */
00099   if (thrust_applied == 0) return;
00100   /* We don't propagate state, it's constant !       */
00101   /* We propagate our covariance                     */
00102   gv_adapt_P =  gv_adapt_P + GV_ADAPT_SYS_NOISE;
00103   /* Compute our measurement. If zdd_meas is in the range +/-5g, meas is less than 24 bits */
00104   const int32_t g_m_zdd = ((int32_t)BFP_OF_REAL(9.81, INT32_ACCEL_FRAC) - zdd_meas)<<(GV_ADAPT_X_FRAC - INT32_ACCEL_FRAC);
00105 #ifdef USE_ADAPT_HOVER
00106   /* Update only if accel and commands are in a valid range */
00107   if (thrust_applied < GV_ADAPT_MIN_CMD || thrust_applied > GV_ADAPT_MAX_CMD
00108       || zdd_meas < -GV_ADAPT_MAX_ACCEL || zdd_meas > GV_ADAPT_MAX_ACCEL)
00109     return;
00110 #endif
00111   if ( g_m_zdd > 0)
00112     gv_adapt_Xmeas = (g_m_zdd + (thrust_applied>>1)) / thrust_applied;
00113   else
00114     gv_adapt_Xmeas = (g_m_zdd - (thrust_applied>>1)) / thrust_applied;
00115   /* Compute a residual */
00116   int32_t residual = gv_adapt_Xmeas - gv_adapt_X;
00117   /* Covariance Error   */
00118   int32_t E = 0;
00119 #ifdef USE_ADAPT_HOVER
00120   if ((thrust_applied > GV_ADAPT_HOVER_MIN_CMD && thrust_applied < GV_ADAPT_HOVER_MAX_CMD) ||
00121       (zdd_meas > -GV_ADAPT_HOVER_ACCEL && zdd_meas < GV_ADAPT_HOVER_ACCEL))
00122     E = gv_adapt_P + GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE_HOVER;
00123   else
00124 #endif
00125     E = gv_adapt_P + GV_ADAPT_MEAS_NOISE;
00126   /* Kalman gain        */
00127   int32_t K = (gv_adapt_P<<K_FRAC) / E;
00128   /* Update Covariance */
00129   gv_adapt_P = gv_adapt_P - ((K * gv_adapt_P)>>K_FRAC);
00130   /* Don't let covariance climb over initial value */
00131   if (gv_adapt_P > GV_ADAPT_P0) gv_adapt_P = GV_ADAPT_P0;
00132   /* Update State */
00133   gv_adapt_X = gv_adapt_X + ((K * residual)>>K_FRAC);
00134   /* Again don't let it climb over a value that would
00135      give less than zero throttle and don't let it down to zero.
00136      30254 = MAX_ACCEL*GV_ADAPT_X_FRAC/MAX_THROTTLE
00137      aka
00138      30254 = 3*9.81*2^8/255
00139      2571632 = 9.81*2^18
00140   */
00141   Bound(gv_adapt_X, 10000, 2571632);
00142 }
00143 
00144 
00145 #endif /* GUIDANCE_V_C */
00146 
00147 #endif /* GUIDANCE_V_ADPT */
